A true relation of a devilish attempt to fire the town of Barnet in the county of Hartford, on Thursday the 16th of this instant October 1679 in a letter to a friend in London. M. D.
4 p.
Printed for Jonathon Robinson ..., London : 1679.
Signed: M. D. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
